actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for the applicability of combat-related tax benefits to Operation Desert Storm participants serving in Israel.

summary.text: States that for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code, Desert Storm-related service shall be treated as service in a combat zone. Includes service performed in Israel with the Patriot missile system or any military activity in defense of Israel as Desert Storm-related service.

titles.title: To provide for the applicability of combat-related tax benefits to Operation Desert Storm participants serving in Israel.
